name: Level 1
description: Fact: Forty is the only number in English which has its letters in alphabetical order.

name: Level 2
description: Fact: 97 is the 25th prime number (the largest two-digit prime number in base 10), following 89 and preceding 101.

name: Level 3
description: Fact: Jesus is said to have been crucified in Year 32.

name: Level 4
description: Fact: 68 is the largest even number that can be expressed in two ways as the sum of two prime numbers: 68 = 7 + 61 = 31 + 37. 5.

name: Level 5
description: Fact: 101 is the 26th prime number. a palindromic number in base 10, and so a palindromic prime.

name: Level 6
description: Fact: According to research done by MIT the number 17 is the most common randomly chosen number between 1 and 20.

name: Level 7
description: Fact: 69 is the Internet’s Coolest Number.

name: Level 8
description: Fact: There are twelve pairs of ribs in the human body – normally.

name: Level 9
description: Fact: 81 is a perfect totient number like all powers of three

name: Level 10
description: Fact: The 22nd Summer Olympics were held in 1980 in previously Soviet Union Moscow, now Russia.
